alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Jones; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 10:23PM CDT until June 30 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Haskell County in west central Texas... Jones County in west central Texas... Northwestern Shackelford County in west central Texas... Southwestern Throckmorton County in west central Texas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1022 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Aspermont to near Neinda to near Noodle, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Anson around 1030 PM CDT. Sagerton around 1035 PM CDT. Rule and Hawley around 1040 PM CDT. Avoca around 1045 PM CDT. Haskell and Rochester around 1050 PM CDT. Stamford, Nugent, Lake Stamford Marina and Paint Creek around 1055 PM CDT. Lueders and Weinert around 1100 PM CDT. Irby around 1105 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Funston, Us-277 Near The Haskell-Knox County Line, Tuxedo, Jud, Big Country B50aptist Assembly, Us-380 Near The Haskell-Stonewall County Line, Truby, The Intersection Of Us-180 And Farm Road 600 and Hodges. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
